> Show by enumeration that there are 14 bit strings of length at most 3.

1. $0$
2. $1$
3. $00$
4. $01$
5. $10$
6. $11$
7. $000$
8. $001$
9. $010$
10. $011$
11. $100$
12. $101$
13. $110$
14. $111$
